body.name: SMUG Office Computer Desk Chair, Ergonomic Mid-Back Mesh Rolling Work Swivel Task Chairs with Wheels, Comfortable Lumbar Support, Comfy Arms for Home, Bedroom, Study, Dorm, Student, Adults, Grey

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Ergonomic Backrest】 The overall design of this office chair is ergonomic, the backrest and lumbar support fit the natural curve of your lower back, let your body and mesh chair perfectly fit, and take the spinal pain away from your body. It provides comfortable support, which helps you maintain a relaxed posture during long hours of work.

【Free Adjustment Multi-Function】The height of the swivel computer chair can be adjusted according to demand. Also, you can tilt backward to relax, switch your sitting posture, and adjust the tilting angle by twisting the tension column under the chair seat,the 90 -120-degree rocking design meets your different sitting positions. It also features 360-degree rotation. Height adjustable from 18.5 to 22.2 inches, matching different stature.

【All Day Comfort】The desk chair has a soft high-density sponge seat, which is covered with durable & breathable mesh fabric and has good elasticity. It is difficult to deform to keep them comfortable for long hours. Perfect for your home office, bedroom, classroom, school, computer desk, apartment, guest workstation, gaming room or conference room. This office chair is the perfect gift for family and friends.

【Premium Materials】 The ergonomic office chair has a reliable height-adjustable gas lift and heavy-duty base, and smooth-rolling casters for great stability and won't damage floors or carpets. It could run smoothly on tile, wooden floors, carpets, and other flooring. All the accessories of our office chair have passed the test of BIFMA, which is a guarantee for your personal safety. Weight capacity: 250lb.

【Easy Assembly】The mesh office chair comes with all hardware & and necessary tools and can be installed within 15 minutes. It can be quickly installed at home by yourself. We also have a professional customer service team, so if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are always with you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded Comfortable Seat Cushion A high-density sponge seat makes the office chair a good choice for all-day comfortable office seating. And, the waterfall edge design ensures your thighs stay relaxed. Ergonomic Backrest Design The sturdy backrest frame supports the natural curve of the spine, allowing you to maintain a good sitting posture. With a back storage basket, make this office chair more beautiful and practical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: I like this chair.My old chair is one I rescued from a office park dumpster eight years ago and Ive been using it ever since. Well, it finally broke and I decided to give this one a try. I like it. It's easy to assemble and comes with the tools you need. The feet and wheels are metal, as is the hydraulic piston and the controls. The seat cushion is well padded and feels good to sit in for long office days. I was a little worried about the mesh seat back. I was a bit worried that it might be cheap or thin. Easily torn or ripped. I was wrong to worry. The mesh is sturdy and unless you really try to tear it, it should last a long time.Two things to note.Compared to my old chair, this one is very light. lighter than you would expect when looking at the pics. No real negative to this and can be a positive if you're an older person or have back problems. You won't have trouble lifting or moving this chair.Secondly, I replaced the stock wheels that this chair comes with, with a set of roller blade wheels they make for office chairs. Makes it easier to roll through carpets and they worked fine on my old chair. I'm five foot, ten inches tall and with the new wheels on this chair, my feet can't reach the floor at the chairs lowest setting. So if you are a shorter person, you wont be able to use the after market, roller blade type carpet wheels with this chair. Not the chairs fault, and its the correct height with the wheels the chair comes with.Over all, i'm very happy with this chair.Oh, and great lower back support. I have a very bad back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair for teenager and great price
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is going to love it when she comes home from school. She’s 10 and this will be her very first desk/chair. Easy installation and very comfortable the color is a pretty color pink as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was pretty easy to put together, I didn't have any issues. Clear precise instructions, all parts were there, with extra. I use the chair in my craft room which has carpet, just a little bit iOf problem rolling. Other than that very good purchase. Also really comfortable.

reviews.reviewerName: Great chair for such a low price!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 out of 5 stars for sure!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a small gal and I was able to put this chair alone (granted it took me awhile to figure out the right angle when I was attaching the seat to the back of the chair).For the price you pay, this chair exceeds expectations. I don't think you can find a better chair at a cheaper price. It is sturdy, the back gives great support and I like that the seat is on the firmer side (not firm enough to where you can only sit for a couple hours).The instructions are very clear, no guess work. And the tool provided is a grade above.Ps. I also bought an electric desk from the same company. Again, great desk for a very good value. Super clear instructions just like chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair for a great price
reviews.reviewText: This is a comfortable chair and a simple design. I like that the arms are fixed and the legs are sturdy. The width of the seat is great for me, but may be snug for large people. I have room to move and the seat cushion is ample to provide comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Build / Comfortable / Affordable
reviews.reviewText: This chair only took me 25 minutes to build, it’s comfortable, feels durable. The height adjusts easily, I think the only complaint I have is the color in the pictures looks more white on the trim/arm rests, but it’s definitely gray, so keep that in mind (: I think it’s still worth the 5 ⭐️ though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW!! what a chair for the money !!
reviews.reviewText: i needed to replace a high back leather office chair that my cat mistook for a scratching post. i didn't want to spend a lot of money so I figured I would give this a try.Assembly is a breeze with everything clearly marked. And, get this, they actually give you a decent T handle tool to put it together.The chair works well, it's light, comfortable and functional, for the money its a steal!If you need a desk chair look no further...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars amazing for the price
reviews.reviewText: the only note i have is that the parts that are white in the picture are actually grey just as other reviews state. other than that it's absolutely amazing for the price, much better than my last chair which was more than $200- better made, more comfortable, easier to assemble, just better lol
